mapper.delete: delete from myhome_usercart_tbl where id=#{id} and code=#{code}
mapper.update: update myhome_usercart_tbl set num=#{num} where id=#{id} and code=#{code}
update myhome_useritem_tbl set title=#{title},price=#{price}, origin=#{origin},content=#{content} where code=#{code}
mapper.sql: code, title, price, content, origin, to_char(item_date,'YY/MM/DD') "item_date"
mapper.select: select code from myhome_useritem_tbl where code=#{code}
mapper.update: update myhome_userbbs_tbl set title=#{title},content=#{content} where seqno=#{seqno}
mapper.select: select seqno, title, id, to_char(bbs_date,'YY/MM/DD') "bbs_date" from (select rownum rn, seqno, title, id, bbs_date from (select seqno, title, id, bbs_date from myhome_userbbs_tbl order by seqno desc)) where rn > #{from} and rn < #{to}
select id from myhome_customers_tbl where id=#{id}
select pwd from myhome_customers_tbl where id=#{id}

select no, title, id, to_char(notice_date,'YY/MM/DD') "notice_date" from (select rownum rn, no, title, id, notice_date from (select no, title, id, notice_date from myhome_usernotice_tbl order by no desc)) where rn > #{from} and rn < #{to}
select no, title, id, content, to_char(notice_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') "notice_date" from myhome_usernotice_tbl where no=#{no}
mapper.update: update myhome_usernotice_tbl set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
